mapper.select: SELECT A.*, LAG(MCC_M_CODE) OVER (ORDER BY MCC_M_CODE ) PREV_MCC_M_CODE, COUNT(MCC_M_CODE) OVER (PARTITION BY MCC_M_CODE ) CNT_M_CODE FROM ( SELECT A.* ,(SELECT MUP_SRCHLVL FROM MF_USER_PMS WHERE A.MCC_S_CODE = MUP_PROGID AND MUP_USERID = #{mup_userid}) MUP_SRCHLVL ,(SELECT MUP_UPDLVL FROM MF_USER_PMS WHERE A.MCC_S_CODE = MUP_PROGID AND MUP_USERID = #{mup_userid}) MUP_UPDLVL ,#{mup_userid} AS MUP_USERID FROM ( SELECT CC.MCC_M_CODE, CC.MCC_M_NAME, CC.MCC_S_CODE, CC.MCC_S_NAME FROM MF_COMM_CODE CC WHERE MCC_L_CODE = 'MENU01' AND NOT MCC_S_CODE = ' ' ) A ) A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MF_USER_PMS WHERE MUP_USERID = A.MUP_USERID AND MUP_PROGID = A.MCC_S_CODE ) ORDER BY MCC_M_CODE, MCC_S_CODE
mapper.update: MERGE INTO MF_USER_PMS UP USING ( SELECT #{mup_userid} MUP_USERID , #{mup_progid} MUP_PROGID FROM DUAL ) S ON ( S.MUP_USERID = UP.MUP_USERID AND S.MUP_PROGID = UP.MUP_PROGID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MUP_SRCHLVL = #{mup_srchlvl} , MUP_UPDLVL = #{mup_updlvl} , CMN_UPD_PROG = 'saveUserPmsList' , CMN_UPD_DATE = SYSDATE , CMN_UPD_ID = #{ss_userid} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( MUP_USERID, MUP_PROGID, MUP_SRCHLVL, MUP_UPDLVL, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_DATE, CMN_MAK_PROG, CMN_MAK_ID) VALUES ( S.MUP_USERID, S.MUP_PROGID, #{mup_srchlvl}, #{mup_updlvl}, 'N', SYSDATE, 'saveUserPmsList', #{ss_userid})
